content: direct link to pattern pdf japanese version 1 pattern is japanese but fully charted using standard crochet symbols **materials** * japanese size 4/0 and 7/0 2 5 and 4 0 mm crochet hooks * approx 135g 178 2 meters pierrot natural bouclé yarn for the bag itself * small amount of pierrot kirakira candy yarn color in three different colors for the flower corsages only **note ** pierrot has authorized an english translation by thetankisclean and shinybug sasha siggs and amanda ribeiro they are sharing it for free with permission from pierrot yarns this translation is only an approximation using the chart provided by the designer there is no guarantee that it is exact to the original pattern **please note ** the site we were hosting the english version of the pattern on has been taken down i will get a new link back up asap ~sasha 5/21/12 1 http //www gosyo co jp/img/acrobat/keito-zakka/28/37899/b pdf 2 http //aclockworkmango com/pdf/naturalbouclebagtranslation pdf
